name: S.O.A.P
description:
This is my first game! my style is inspired by that of Scott Cawthon's as I was a fnaf modeler, and his style grew on to me. The 3d graphics were all made in blender 2.7 and the game was made in Clickteam Fusion2.5

Join the fight against the germs! Defeat the Germ army to reclaim and liberate your homeland from Germ Control!

Everything made by me except sounds

Sounds were from https://freesound.org/

I will try to find and credit the original sound designers as soon as i can!

(please note that these are placeholder sounds and will not be in the final game as I want everything to be original)
